title: ‘Delete isn’t defence’: Opposition trains guns on BJP over Himanta’s ‘point-blank’ video
description: The video, captioned “point blank shot”, appeared to combine original footage of Sarma holding an air rifle with artificial intelligence-generated visuals of bullets striking images of men wearing skull caps and beards, markers widely associated with Muslim identity.

title: US companies accused of ‘AI washing’ in citing artificial intelligence for job losses

content:

description: Western Massachusetts colleges are embracing artificial intelligence to support students and prepare graduates for a workforce increasingly shaped by the technology.

title: Longmont media veteran launches AI news site, but is it just 'a news-shaped object'?
description: Scott Converse has spent years launching and experimenting with local news projects, driven in part by his dissatisfaction with the state of local journalism. The longtime local media and technology figure's latest project, Longmont News Network, uses artificial intelligence to generate stories about civic affairs in Longmont.
